title: O.H.M.S.: royal visit to Australia 1963
brief_description: The royal visit of the Queen and Duke of Edinburgh to all Australian states in 1963. Shows a respresentative selection of the engagements undertaken by the Royal couple, and the behind the scenes activities of the Australian Post Office related to the visit. Also shows some good archival footage of the “south bank” area in Melbourne before the complex was developed. Narrated by T. Horton.
